citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-me: We couldn't make a citation for you. You can create one manually using the '{{int:citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}}' tab above.
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-mess: You can use the '{{int:citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-button}}' button below to generate a properly formatted reference from the external link.
